name: Penne with Chicken and Mushrooms
description: Creamy penne pasta with chicken thighs, mushrooms, prosciutto, and tomatoes in a white wine cream sauce.
instructions: Heat the butter and oil in a large frying pan. Add onion and garlic and stir over low heat until the onion is tender. Add prosciutto to the pan and fry until crisp.
Add chicken thighs and cook until browned. Add mushrooms and cook until softened.
Add tomato, tomato paste, and white wine. Simmer until reduced.
Stir in cream and heat through.
Cook penne according to package directions. Drain and toss with sauce. Serve with freshly grated Parmesan.
